[[Image:Middle-earth The White Hand.png|thumb]]
'''Middle-earth: The White Hand''' (MEWH), released in [[1997]], was an expansion set for [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game|MECCG]].

MEWH further complicates the game by adding a third faction, the corrupted ''Fallen-Wizard'', whose player can use both hero and minion resources and characters, although with restrictions.

*'''Number of individual cards:''' 122 (47 rares, 40 uncommons, and 35 commons)

MEWH was sold in 12 card boosters (36 boosters per display) with 2 rares, 4 uncommons, and 6 commons in each.

[[Category:MECCG sets]]
